actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Production.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Agricultural Production and Stabilization of Prices

official_title: A bill to amend the Agriculture Act of 1949 to require the Secretary of Agriculture to reduce the price received by producers for milk that is produced by cows injected with bovine growth hormone, and for other purposes.
short_title: Bovine Growth Hormone User Assessment Act

summary.text: Bovine Growth Hormone User Assessment Act - Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949 to reduce the price received for milk produced by cows injected with bovine growth hormone.

titles.title: Bovine Growth Hormone User Assessment Act

A bill to amend the Agriculture Act of 1949 to require the Secretary of Agriculture to reduce the price received by producers for milk that is produced by cows injected with bovine growth hormone, and for other purposes.
